name: Hero of the Desert
description:
Humanity needs a hero. Our Earth's core has been stolen by evil creatures. Recover the core or insects will rule the world!!

Controls

WASD / Arrows to move

Space to shoot

This game is a submission for GMTK's 2021 Game Jam.

Created in 48 hs:

Developed by Kotzi

Music and sound effects by Red Calcifer

Art by Wanderix

Notes: Mute button is broken. We're very sorry! We could't manage to correct it before the deadline. "Play again" button is also broken!

Also, you can try to play this on mobile! (but it's pretty experimental)
